summary: Same as WorldMapPaperFlat , but not flat , and without all the problems that come with moving the markers to map plane.
descriptionHtml:
===========================================
PaperMap:Height by nushu
===========================================

 I released this because my \"flat\" version was not usable due to moving the markers to
the flat map plane braking location discovery. This is a compromise and although a lot of work
went to waste , I still prefer this to the original satnav map.
 This version will not interfere in any way with gameplay , it\'s just a mesh and texture replacement.
 This map also does NOT have the problem of being visible in the world , even from great heights!
 Sorry to all that got really excited at the prospect of a flat map , I was too.



What it does
===========================================
- Replaces : worldmap sky clouds mesh , with a paper textured map
- Hides    : worldmap 3d terrain and objects
- Removes  : worldmap inexcusable distance fog (zoomed out is now as clear
             as zoomed in).



Depencencies
===========================================
- None.





Instalation
===========================================

0. If you have any version of the WorldMapPaperFlat mod , remove all files related to it:

    v1:
     * delete all   Data\\Meshes\\terrain\\tamriel\\tamriel.32.*.btr     files
     * delete all   Data\\Textures\\terrain\\tamriel\\tamriel.32.*.dds   files

    v2:
     * delete       Data\\WorldMapPaperFlat-RemoveFog.esp
     * delete       Data\\Meshes\\WorldMapPaperFlat\\mesh.nif
     * delete       Data\\Textures\\WorldMapPaperFlat\\*.dds

    v3:
     * delete       Data\\WorldMapPaperFlat-RemoveFog.esp
     * delete       Data\\WorldMapPaperFlat-MoveMarkers.esp
     * delete       Data\\Meshes\\WorldMapPaperFlat\\mesh.nif
     * delete       Data\\Textures\\WorldMapPaperFlat\\*.dds
     * delete       Data\\Scripts\\WorldMapPaperFlat.pex


1. Copy the Data folder to Skyrim root (overwrite if asked).
2. Make sure PaperMapHeight-RemoveFog.esp is activated.




Contents
===========================================

- plugin to remove the outrageous fog from the map :
    Data\\PaperMapHeight-RemoveFog.esp

- mesh :
    Data\\Meshes\\PaperMapHeight\\mesh.nif

- texture :
    Data\\Textures\\PaperMapHeight\\map.dds

- ini file :
    Data\\PaperMapHeight-RemoveFog.ini
author: nushu
